title: Business Card CRM
approach: Built with React Native & Drizzle ORM. Integrated Voice-to-Text transcription to automate contact entry during networking.

title: Rabbit E-Commerce
approach: Optimized for high conversion using Next.js. Integrated Shiprocket API for automated logistics and real-time tracking.

title: Dynamic Coupon System
approach: Developed a custom logic engine to handle complex discount rules and time-sensitive promotional codes.

title: Real-time Chat App
approach: Leveraged Socket.io and MERN stack for sub-100ms message latency and persistent chat history.

title: MERN Task Manager
approach: Focused on CRUD efficiency and drag-and-drop UI for seamless task prioritization.

title: Inventory Pro
approach: Built a scalable dashboard using PostgreSQL and Node.js to track warehouse stock levels globally.

title: Fitness Tracker
approach: React Native app utilizing accelerometer data to provide real-time workout feedback.

title: Adaptive Portfolio
approach: Utilized Dynamic Serving and Adaptive Design to deliver tailored assets per device resolution.

title: Node.js API Gateway
approach: Engineered a central gateway to manage microservices authentication and rate limiting.

title: Bespoke CRM Admin
approach: Custom admin panel with Drizzle ORM to manage user roles and data permissions efficiently.
